stateDiagram

OFF

OFF : OFF

OFF : enter / #123; turnOff()#59; #125;

state ON_GROUP {

        ON1

        ON1 : ON1

        ON1 : enter / #123; turnBlue()#59; #125;

        ON2

        ON2 : ON2

        ON2 : enter / #123; turnYellow()#59; #125;

        ON2 : enter / #123; count = 0#59; #125;

        ON2 : 1. INC / #123; count++#59; #125;

        ON2 : 2. INC / #123; printCount()#59; #125;

        ON_HOT

        ON_HOT : ON_HOT

        ON_HOT : enter / #123; turnRed()#59; #125;

}

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

OFF --> ON1 : INC

ON_GROUP --> OFF : OFF

ON1 --> ON2 : INC

ON1 --> OFF : DIM

ON2 --> ON_HOT : INC [count >= 3]

ON2 --> ON1 : DIM

ON_HOT --> ON2 : DIM

ROOT.(InitialState) --> OFF
Events
settings
